description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment (Section 96a) in relation to planning application ref. 162124FUL dated 14.10.2016 for 'Change of use of the existing building from office (Class B1 (a)) to hotel (Class C1); demolition and replacement of the second floor; and alterations to the external appearance of the building to create a 133 bed hotel with a new guards hut, cycle store car parking and associated works (Departure from the Local Plan).'  Amendment seeking to revise approved drawings to amend Obscured panel omitted between first floor and second floor window;  locations of windows onto staircase; Entrance cladding; arrangements of glazing to cafe; reduction of roof level plant screens; arrangement of windows; retention of existing louvres; installation of canopy over side entrance door and amendments to access road and footpath
